title: What did Aatrox say when Nocturne ulted?
body:
"Is it Darkin here or is it just me?"



I'll show my self out now.

replies.body: What's an aatrox? is that the galio skin?
Whats a galio? is that a Yorick skin?
I'm pretty sure that's urgot's ultimate, right?
What's an urgot? Is that a Warwick's passive?
But...aren't Warwick and Aatrox the same person?
No, thats Skarner you're thinking of
But ppl actually play skarner, you ruined it D:
pretty sure you're thinking of singed. the giant guy who turns into a crow.
No, Warick is the bif wolf with a bit of lifesteal and Aatrox is that new galio skin, gg
http://i.imgur.com/No1jS1s.png
Confirmed, it's urgot's ultimate.
GG THAT'S SO OP NURF PLEZ

Building RoA on a manaless champ

http://i.imgur.com/avHnbUZ.gif?noredirect
Maybe replace it with protobelt? Gives CDR, HP, AP, and the active.

ROA was chosen because the amount of ap it gives with the amount of hp it gives he is right most things will die from that one combo in a medium area and anything else that survives was either way out of the area and there fore not a threat or too tanky to threaten aatrox so cdr doesnt matter
You also can't have both protobelt and gunblade.
you can you just have to use them  for at diffrent times and diffrent situations better haveing an option than having none
lost raw ap more than makes up for the whole item cost anything else is just extra stats thats why the item is over loaded.

RoA was always cost efficient without mana.

People in this season completely lost their minds.
_"Frozen Mallet OP", "RoA OP", "Boots OP"._
Mana pots OP, oh wait...
http://i.imgur.com/5Do9qcP.png?noredirect
#prayformanapot
:c
it was just RoA and Rylais
I've seen quite a lot of "Frozen Mallet OP" threads before Tanksuo was nerfed, mind you.
RoA is gold efficent with just ap and health you dont even need mana or the passive for it to be gold efficent

What did Nocturne say when he ulted Fizz?

"SHAAAARKNESS!"
Don't leave, keep at it and you will ryze to the top!
That's good because i have a Zilean of them, some of them are pretty Gnarly. I Garentee that I could do this for a while.
